resources.string:
FashionHub App Term of Use Terms of Use: By accessing our fashion store, you agree to abide by our terms, including fair usage, intellectual property rights, and responsible conduct. Any misuse or unauthorized activity will result in immediate termination of services.
Privacy Policy: We prioritize the privacy and security of your personal information. We collect only necessary data for order processing and do not share it with third parties. Your information is safeguarded through encryption and secure protocols. We may use cookies for a better browsing experience. By using our platform, you consent to our privacy practices.
By continuing you accept our Privacy Policy and Term of Use
